text: Thundergod is a 1928 American silent drama film directed by Charles J. Hunt and starring Cornelius Keefe, Lila Lee and Walter Long.Munden p.811 An independent production, it is based on a short story by James Oliver Curwood. ==Synopsis== After his girlfriend leaves him, a city man goes to work in a lumber camp owned by a woman whose rivals are trying to put her out of business. ==Cast== * Cornelius Keefe as Roland Hale * Lila Lee as Enid Bryant * Walter Long as Bruce Drossler * Helen Lynch as Alyce * Ray Hallor as Ollie Sanderson * Jules Cowles as Clinky ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1928 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Charles J. Hunt Category:Films set in forests
title: Thundergod (film)
